text: In the second one1464, patients were randomized to receive cisplatin with concurrent EBRT, followed by brachytherapy or gemcitabine with the same radiation therapy.Although it was observed more frequent complete pathological response in the study arm (gemcitabine) than in the control arm $9 6 \%$ versus $8 8 \%$ ), no difference in terms of DFS or OS was reported between the two treatment groups.
